setParameter

public boolean setParameter(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.Object value)
                     throws ConfigurationException
Configures the rule. Reads in the values of the parameters XXX and class-max-complexity.

Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter being loaded from Hammurapi configuration
value - the value of the parameter being loaded from Hammurapi configuration
Throws:
ConfigurationException - in case of a not supported parameter
